data.title: Future City® Competition
data.meta_description: Become a Future City Mentor! You will work alongside the team educator and act as a coach and role model. They provide guidance, connections between academic concepts and real-life, and technical assistance to the middle school team members.

Background screenings are required every three years for mentors
